item.title: ‘Lover’ by Taylor Swift rises to #6 (+4) on the Billboard 200, three years after release.

item.title: Happy 55th birthday to the talented Kylie Minogue.

item.title:
‘The Little Mermaid’ makeup designer responds to criticism that a queer artist should have been hired for Ursula, says this version was not based on “any drag acts” like the original:
“I find that very offensive. Why can’t I do as good a job as a queer makeup artist?… It wasn’t… Show more
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello at Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour show in East Rutherford.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Her critically-acclaimed sixth studio album debuted at #1 on the Billboard 200 and spawned hits like ‘Stupid Love’ and the Grammy-winning ‘Rain On Me.’ It was ranked as the 5th best album of 2020 by Billboard.
item.author: PopBase
